summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Arabic login error handling and admin features. Fixed critical frontend compilation issue and routing problem. All requested features are now working correctly.
passed_tests: Login page loads successfully with Arabic RTL layout
Wrong password (admin@transfers.com + wrongpassword) shows Arabic error message: 'كلمة المرور غير صحيحة'
Correct admin login (admin@transfers.com + admin123) succeeds and navigates to /rider
Admin button appears on rider dashboard with amber styling and Shield icon
Admin dropdown menu contains 'لوحة التحكم' (Control Panel) and 'تسجيل الخروج' (Logout) options
Control panel navigation successfully redirects to /admin page
Arabic text display and RTL layout working correctly throughout the application
Error message display with proper data-testid attribute for testing
Admin authentication state properly maintained across navigation
